text: Louis Stokes (February 23, 1925 - August 18, 2015) was an American attorney and politician. He was born in Cleveland, Ohio. He served 15 terms in the United States House of Representatives from 1969 through 1999. He was the first black congressman elected in the state of Ohio. Stokes died in Cleveland, Ohio from lung and brain cancer, aged 90.WKCY Former Congressman Louis Stokes has died ==References== ==Other websites== * Western Reserve Historical Society's website about the lives of Louis and Carl Stokes * Collections *Stokes: An American Dream on PBS's World channel Category:1925 births Category:2015 deaths Category:African-American politicians Category:American military personnel of World War II Category:Cancer deaths in Ohio Category:Deaths from brain cancer Category:Deaths from lung cancer Category:Military people from Ohio Category:Politicians from Cleveland Category:United States representatives from Ohio Category:Democratic Party (United States) politicians Category:Lawyers from Cleveland
title: Louis Stokes
